about_the_game:
Traverse through the intricate web of a randomly generated microscopic world, each crawling with its own set of obstacles. Your ultimate objective? To navigate through this labyrinth of a world and confront the final enemy - the harbinger of doom threatening to extinguish the very essence of life within.

Embark on a adventure featuring a straightforward, distinctive combat system. Seamlessly upgrade your abilities with easy to understand mechanics, allowing you to concentrate on the action. Harness relics to mutate and gain advantages in battle to defeat your enemies.



Embark on a journey through a world created from randomness, where every step is into the unknown. Each step moves you closer to the perils of the unknown and further into danger.


Survival depends on your ability to evolve and adapt to the increasingly perilous environment. Mutating to gain new abilities and strength is your only option.



The final boss is waiting for you and they don’t plan on letting you survive.

Features:

  • Mutation Relics - Discover and utilize powerful relics to mutate your character, gaining new abilities and advantages that will help you in combat.
  • Simple and Unique Combat System - Engage in battles with a combat system that is easy to grasp yet offers depth and strategy.
  • Challenging Enemies and Environments - Encounter a diverse array of enemies that will test your skills and keep you on your toes.
  • Procedurally Generated Levels - Explore procedurally generated levels.
  • Intuitive Upgrade System - Progress through the game with an upgrade system that is straightforward and easy to understand.

name: Cellular Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 / Radeon HD 7750 / Intel UHD Graphics 620
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600k / AMD FX-9590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 390X / Intel Arc A750

short_description: Cellular Survival is an action shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Choose your path, equip yourself, and push forward and overcome the perils that stand in the way of your survival. The fate of the microscopic realm rests in your hands.
